origination.corpname: Society of American Archivists. University of Michigan Student Chapter.

did.unittitle: Society of American Archivists Student Chapter (University of Michigan) records. 1993-1996
did.abstract: University of Michigan student chapter of the Society of American Archivists. Records contain founding documents, including a copy of the constitution, e-mail correspondence, minutes and meeting notes as well as membership lists.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan.

acqinfo.p: Donated by Society of American Archivists University of Michigan Student Chapter (donor no.8360), in 1996.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Society of American Archivists Student Chapter (University of Michigan) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan.

bioghist.p: Founded in 1994, the Society of American Archivists University of Michigan Student Chapter serves as a "means of introducing new archivists into the profession, as well as enhancing education by providing an additional focus for students to discuss archival issues, identify with the profession, and engage in professional activities" (https://umsisaa.wordpress.com/about/). They also host a range of social, professional, and academic activities for students.

arrangement.p: The records document the founding of this student chapter at the University of Michigan and have been divided into two series: Organizational Materials and E-mail Correspondence.

scopecontent.p: The Society of American Archivists Student Chapter (University of Michigan) records date from 1993-1996. The records document the founding of this student chapter at the University of Michigan.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Archivists--Michigan--Ann Arbor.
controlaccess.corpname: Society of American Archivists. University of Michigan Student Chapter.

scopecontent.p: The Organizational Materials (1993-1995, 0.2 linear feet) series contains founding documents, including a copy of the constitution, correspondence, minutes and meeting notes as well as membership lists.
The E-mail Correspondence (1995-1996, 1.13 MB) series contains e-mail correspondence on social, professional and academic activities.
